attributes.action: Allow the public display of flags which represent any country throughout the world on property owned or licenced to rent by the occupier of the property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The flying and public displaying of a countries national flag is not a racist act and people should not be offended by any other countries national flag being displayed.  It is merely a sign of national support, usually exemplified by an important sporting event.
I am writing this petition on behalf of a group of students in Coventry University Accommodation who have been banned from displaying the St Georges Flag in our windows prior to the Rugby World Cup Final.
